SELECT annualfee_pakage_code as annualfeePakageCode ,functionary_id as functionaryId ,annualfee_pakage_name as annualfeePakageName ,annualfee_pakage_price as annualfeePakagePrice ,annualfee_pakage_text_sangse as annualfeePakageTextSangse ,annualfee_pakage_discount_rate as annualfeePakageDiscountRate ,annualfee_pakage_date_registration as annualfeePakageDateRegistration FROM annualfee_pakage
where annualfee_pakage_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or annualfee_pakage_text_sangse like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where ${searchOption} like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY annualfee_pakage_date_registration DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}

SELECT annualfee_pakage_code as annualfeePakageCode ,functionary_id as functionaryId ,annualfee_pakage_name as annualfeePakageName ,annualfee_pakage_price as annualfeePakagePrice ,annualfee_pakage_text_sangse as annualfeePakageTextSangse ,annualfee_pakage_discount_rate as annualfeePakageDiscountRate ,annualfee_pakage_date_registration as annualfeePakageDateRegistration FROM annualfee_pakage join annualfee_pakage_ownership using(annualfee_pakage_code) where annualfee_pakage_ownership.citizen_id = #{memeberId}

SELECT annualfee_pakage.annualfee_pakage_code ,annualfee_pakage.functionary_id ,annualfee_pakage.annualfee_pakage_name ,annualfee_pakage.annualfee_pakage_price ,annualfee_pakage.annualfee_pakage_text_sangse ,annualfee_pakage.annualfee_pakage_discount_rate ,annualfee_pakage.annualfee_pakage_date_registration ,annualfee_pakage_authority.annualfee_pakage_authority_code ,annualfee_pakage_authority.adminagency_code ,adminagency.adminagency_name FROM annualfee_pakage left join annualfee_pakage_authority using(annualfee_pakage_code) inner join adminagency on annualfee_pakage_authority.adminagency_code = adminagency.adminagency_code where annualfee_pakage_code = #{annualfeePakageCode}
